text: Support #Arbeiderpartiet, add a #twibbon to your avatar now! - http://twibbon.com/join/Arbeiderpartiet
"I had a bad time in 1982 and bad now. Not so much for me, but for my wife and my children, who suffer with these absolutely unfair accusations.
Manana to Antofagasta!
Now a meal (of work) and to sleep. @ pinera77 and @manena are still there tweeting?
Thank you very much to all those who have sent me messages of support. 'To be in this you need the energy and good vibes!
We lodge in a cabin of my cousin andres chadwick in penuelas. We arrived very late to the serene and now we are leaving to ovalle
And in the afternoon we return to serena because we have a meeting with the housing debtors. We had a great tour!
Khun Apirak visited the trust in the sending room. http://twitpic.com/cd1oy
Now I have a team to help take care of this twitter. If there is a question I can ask through this way.
@josepinera well in cnn, thanks
Finishing family bike. Leon stepped in, he walked alone all the time.
@chilenoblack we are going to read it!
Now to have lunch as a family. My grandchildren have already tired of the bicycle. Upload photos.
@JosePinera Thanks for the recommendation. I dream of a couple of days with the family in the magical Lake Caburga. You are invited with your children
@arturopavez I upload my photos at www.flickr.com/sebastianpinera
The Prime Minister is visiting the project Suthat per day. The village of Khok Chang, Songkhla province (team)
RT @comandosp With the rejuvenated soul of the guideline with children. Great proposal from @sebastianpinera so that there are no more "Cisarros" in Chile!
The black twitter is coming. It promises to be good ...
RT @comandosp Why does SP want to be President? listen here: http://bit.ly/1zgPp1
Thanks for all of you. Happy birthday to me by twitter
RT @Manena now that the real Negro Piñera @negropinerae came
Finally at home. We inaugurated women's command, I will prepare an Army seminar presentation and thousands of activities. But Midnight is missing.
The Prime Minister is currently attending the ASEAN Inter-Parliamentary Assembly (AIPA) in Pattaya. Chonburi (Team)
The reddish green goes for election on continued government cooperation. We will preserve, renew and improve welfare. See live at 12 on arbeiderpartiet.no
Well, it's been a glorious summer. Disconnecting yourself from the world is true freedom. I recommend it every once in a while!
Had a great time with the family. Kids just love the summer holidays, but who does not like nearly two months off!
It has not all been relaxation though. I've been keeping up to date with progress in global efforts to get every child into school.
Stay tuned! I'll share one fact with you each day for the next week, starting tomorrow. Be sure to retweet!
For four years, the @Arbeiderpartiet, SV and SP have worked together in a majority government. Now we want to proceed: http://bit.ly/QOWKQ
Arriving at the army seminary
By the way, for all you perplexed parents out there, summer hols can be great for deciphering teenage language code.
Best outcome for me while in Napa Valley (in addition to uncontrollable culinary indulgence) was connecting w / daughter, Iman.
Do not over-plan, just 'hang out'-miracles can happen!
Departing from a seminar presentation organized by Ejercito Chileno on strategic perspectives in Latin America.
@MSalazarH in environmental and unconventional energy matters we have important proposals, some published in www.pinera2010.cl
@albertconcejal I hope to be in those parts soon
Tomorrow I will be exhibiting at enapyme, so I must continue working on the presentation and refining the respective proposals.
FACT # 1: No. of kids out of school larger than tot. pop. of NYC, London, Beijing, Mumbai, Tokyo, Mexico City & Cairo: 75m Plz RT
@ Gaz1A Of the 75m children out of school, 55% of them are girls. But there are many reasons, not just parents. More: http://bit.ly/12twMY
@DennisBloeme Sub-Saharan Africa alone contains half of the world's out of school children. Another quarter are in S & W Asia.
@ Marrionette90 Most do not have the chance due to poverty, cost, access or gender discrimination. Conflict forces others to drop out.
@ Marie_2902 1st, learn more: http://bit.ly/12twMY. 2nd, tell your friends. 3rd, let your government know it's an important issue to you.
I leave this cause http://bit.ly/3eHpU/group.php?gid=113754492199&ref=mf
RT @comandosp as not everything is stuck ... in the SP command "love is in the air". If everything goes well, tomorrow we will have news about it
Seeing. Where is Elisa?
The Prime Minister is preparing a statement of government work. Can be tracked live on TAT at 10.00 (team).
Thai Prime Minister launches website And add new channels of communication through the public. http://www.pm.go.th (team)
@Tom_Rodrigues Education can unlock development on many fronts, but other reforms must follow: labor laws, business environment, etc ...
@JasonGoff Good request! Most of my facts come from UNESCO, the ILO, or World Bank.
Download the Government's 6-month performance summary report. http://bit.ly/rPqRN (team)
Download the presentation of the Prime Minister at the press conference. http://bit.ly/M2rUw (team)
Just read The Anatomy of Peace.Maybe no major breakthroughs, but certainly great 4 giving one's own humanity a check-in & fine tune
At the core of all complexities that make us human is our heart, healthy only when fed love.
Let's focus on our core, it really does make the world go round.
Developing world loses about $ 100bn a year not educating girls. Int'l aid to developing world? About $ 100bn! Plz RT
@Natadelamilk congratulations for registering in the electoral registries!
In @comandosp something happens. Several walk with the head (or the heart) in another part.
It is not a call to order. They tell me that @comandosp love touched the door. Good for that!
It is not a call to order. They tell me that @comandosp love touched the door. Good for that !.
Our command is revolutionized. It seems that an army of cupids arrived. "Love is in the air". And the protagonists do not want to recognize.
Extra cost to world to get every kid into school? $ 11bn. Cost to US alone on bailouts & stimulus? $ 11trillion. Plz RT
Just watched GI Joe -decent action. Powerful women causing havoc in leather jumpsuits inspiring me to get in shape ...
On other hand, will watch more TV now, and probably sleep in tomorrow ...
Frei disappoints me. My parents were DC. They always motivated us to the public service. As good parents, they always supported me in my campaigns.
In the V region. Preparing for the General Council of RN.
In 2009, global employment could rise by 60million. Right now, the world is desperate for 18m new teachers. Plz RT
Great advice from RN. Now to rest because tomorrow we have an activity on the ground with @firarazaval and the young people in Viña.
Give a girl 1yr of extra schooling and she can increase her income by as much as 20% .That's quite a pay-rise! Plz RT
@pgonzalezcarcey not yet, but we are trying to enthuse. At least have a blog, from www.pinera2010.cl or www.ceciliamorel.cl
In this same hall of honor of the National Congress on March 11, 2010 we will begin to write more beautiful pages of our history.
YOU can get every child into school! Political will is born from popular will. Your leaders need to be pushed. Plz RT
Arriving in Santiago after a tour of the V region. Grand Council of RN. They saw it?
Francisco "Chamaco" Valdés has died. Great Chamaco. Colocolo and the Chileans owe you a lot and we will always remember you as a crack
I just talked to Mariza, lady of the great Chamaco Valdes. A true gentleman. How many joys and emotions we owe him. Big boy
Is on his way to Lørenskog Nursing Home to present an elder plan with Bjarne Håkon and Gro Harlem B. See live at http://arbeiderpartiet.no at 10.00.
Evidence links lack of girls in school 2 lack of basic water services.Burden of finding & carrying water falls on girls' shoulders
Estimated 40bn hours / yr R spent collecting water in sub-Saharan Africa.This vastly reduces the time girls hve for school. Plz RT
Prime Minister Abhisit Answer questions asked through http://pm.go.th First week Can watch at http://www.pm.go.th/media/weekly/1556 (team)
Questions asked through http://pm.go.th The highest votes were cast each week. The team will ask Prime Minister Abhisit to answer questions on the website (team).
Questions will be collected and counted every Friday. Prime Minister Abhisit will answer and bring the video up every Tuesday. http://www.pm.go.th/media/weekly (team)
Complaints will be sorted out to the responsible person and the team that handles the complaint. Specifically, proceed to (team).
Friends: I leave you link to Cecilia's post. He's new to this, but he puts a lot of effort into it http://bit.ly/18yWbj
Looking forward to meeting Jensen for the duel tonight, but first of all, we will launch Kulturløftet II. We will continue for the cultural life for 4 new years!
Want to know how to help? Watch this space. Clue? World Cup 2010 ... Plz RT
Remember young people around the world today. They are the font of our future. Let's support them: http://bit.ly/Q8vp6
The years wrinkle the skin, but only the loss of ideals wrinkles the soul. Happy day to all young people (by age or spirit)
At this moment I am with the best? Notero de cqc roberto
In Italy ... gosh I had not realized how much I'd missed it!
Maybe I was Italian in a past life, or sometimes it's the charm of the Italian people making me feel this way?
What do football and education have in common? You can find out in 7 days. Plz RT
@jonas_ap opens election campaign center to Oslo Ap on Youngst today, so now you can meet Ap on street level. Hope many people come back soon!
We managed to enthuse the @ceciliamorel welcome!
@juanrojasm Our Government will be led by young people, as they are already leading the Tantauco Groups. You are welcome!
@kozmania thanks
@Lakawila Soon we will visit Iquique, as well as all the communes of Chile
Music helped heal some of Africa's wounds. Sport can too ... Plz RT
Spent some time in Elba, saw Napoleon's temp abode, ate enough gelato to make Italian cows moo in unision & protest
Whether in its simplicity or sophistication, contemplating whether an inch of Italy hsnt been touched by its own unique brand of charm.
http://twitpic.com/dus9y - If in such idyllic surroundings I do not come up with creative solutions for education 4 all ..
The might as well exchange campaigner's robe for school uniform and get myself back into the classroom this fall!
Then again, without my education, would life have afforded me the privilege to enjoy such a lovely experience?
Through my life, has education not been my shield, sword, and olive branch all rolled into one?
In a world where injustice is rampant, opportunity random, is not education the greatest leveler of playing fields?
Give it to everyone and may the best man / woman win!
http://twitpic.com/dut8u -
At the Central Station fair they gave me a dog.
@crvicuna we are convinced of that, but we have to work
